name: BeatBlasters III Demo
detailed_description:
Beatblasters III is an action platformer mixed with rhythm game mechanics.
Each level in the game has a different goal. The player can achieve these goals using three different powers.
Each power has an energy cost and must be charged by pressing the buttons in synch with the music.
Everytime the player charges or uses a power, music is played according to the action done.
The result is an intense musical action game.
